titleStmt.title: A plea for ministers in sequestrations; wherein Mr. Mossom's Apology for the sequestred clergy, is duly considered and discussed.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Parkhurst, at the three Crowns against the lower conduit in Cheapside,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Mossom, Robert. An apology in the behalf of the sequestred clergy.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the three Crowns against the lower conduit in Cheapside
